name: socket
content:
socket noun [C]
(ELECTRICAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the part of a piece of equipment, especially electrical equipment, into which another part fits: an electrical socket a light socketUK He had forgotten to plug the television into the mains socket. The air freshener plugs into a car's lighter socket.
4FR/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

socket noun [C]
(BODY PART)
a part of the body into which another part fits: a tooth/eye socket a ball-and-socket joint like the hip joint

Add to word list
Add to word list
a hollow or curved part into which something fits: The bulb screwed easily into a socket. Somehow the bone was pulled from its socket.
